text: This is a list of countries in the Continent of Oceania. Flag Map English names, and ISO Local name(s) Capital Population Area Currency AustraliaAustralia has two outside territories in the Antarctic, the Heard Island and McDonald Islands and the claimed Australian Antarctic Territory. Commonwealth of Australia AUS Canberra Australian dollar Federated States of Micronesia FSM Palikir United States dollar Fiji Republic of Fiji FJI Fiji Hindi फीजी/Fiji - रिपब्लिक ऑफ फीजी/ Ripablik ăph Phījī Suva Fijian dollar Kiribati Republic of Kiribati KIR South Tarawa \----Bairiki Kiribati dollar Marshall Islands Republic of the Marshall Islands MHL Majuro United States dollar Nauru Republic of Nauru NRU No official Capital \----Government offices are in Yaren Australian dollar New ZealandNew Zealand has five island groups in the Subantarctic. New Zealand claims territory in the Antarctic as the Ross Dependency. title: List of Oceanian countries
